title: HonoConnectionImpl throws NPE
body:
I just noticed this in the log:

~~~
11:49:18.669 [vert.x-eventloop-thread-0] DEBUG o.e.h.s.http.DefaultFailureHandler - unexpected internal failure
java.lang.NullPointerException: null
~~~

<details>
